name: The Cult of Refrigodrator
description:
Awaken the refrigerator god, awaken The Refrigodrator!

You play as the high priest of a refrigerator worshipping cult. Set in somewhat cyberpunk city, recruit as many followers as you can into your cult. Beware though, cultist need foods, and hungry members will turn into demons! Get food by killing townspeople, or if you’re in a pinch, sacrifice your own followers for food!

It is believed that if you have 100 followers at the end of the 30th cycle, you’ll awaken The Refrigodrator.

Manual:

Control:

WASD - move
LMB - melee attack
RMB - command followers
Q - cast ice beam
E - cast shattering ice
R - cast heal
F - cast conversion

---

Made for Ludum Dare 40. Theme: The more you have, the worse it is.
